_internal_record_notes_: Complex record spanning apd p193-194 , rewview... rewnormalize
org_name: SAN FRANCISCO DEPARTMENT OF AGING AND ADULT SERVICES AGING AND DISABILITY RESOURCE CENTER - Richmond Senior Center
description: Aging and Disability Resource Centers (ADRCs) offer the general public a single source for connecting to free information and assistance on issues affecting older people and people with disabilities, regardless of their income. These resource centers are welcoming and convenient locations for you and your family to get objective and accurate information, advice, and have access to a wide variety of services. With hubs throughout San Francisco, the ADRC Information and Assistance Specialists provide a wide range of services in multiple languages. www.sfdaas.org
notes: For more info visit one or our ADRC’s or contact ADRC Supervisor at 415-750-4111

keys: The ADRC’s can support individuals with information, referral, and/or assistance in the following areas: Caregiver Assistance and Support
Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender (LGBT) Programs and Services, Medical and Dental Care
Seniors (60+) and Young Adults with Disabilities (18-59)
